title: Global basketball shoe sales 2012 - 2013 , by NBA player
summary: This statistic shows a projection of office rent growth in the united from second quarter of 2015 to fourth quarter of 2016 . During the fourth quarter of 2017 , it was found that social network accounted for 53 percent of paid mobile businesses .
gold: This timeline depicts global basketball shoe sales in 2012 and 2013 , by NBA player . In 2013 , Michael Jordan and his shoe brand , Jordan , earned approximately 2.5 billion U.S. dollars .
